_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Taco Spigot
author: hostmaster@waterfallgaming.net
description: A even-higher higher performance PaperSpigot fork that adds new features.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Taco Spigot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk update
apk add curl

cd /mnt/server

if [ -z "${DL_VERSION}" ] || [ "${DL_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DL_VERSION="lastSuccessfulBuild"
fi

curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} https://ci.techcable.net/job/TacoSpigot/${DL_VERSION}/artifact/build/TacoSpigot.jar

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: TacoSpigot Version
variables.description: The version of TacoSpigot to download, Use "latest" for latest.
